name: Event Timeline Feed
author: ScriptsTown

sections.description:
Event Timeline Feed plugin adds an event timeline on your WordPress website. You can create multiple timelines for different pages of your site and add any number of events to the timeline with the event title, description, event link, icon, date, and time. Also, you can choose from multiple eye-catching layouts to showcase the timeline. Each layout has its unique sets of colors and typography settings, that you can use to further enhance the layout design.

Event Timeline Feed Features

  • Event Timeline Feed Features
  • Unlimited Event Timelines
  • Multiple Eye-catching Layouts
  • Customizable Layouts
  • Typography Settings
  • Unlimited Colors Options
  • Event Link, Icon, Date
  • Timeline Feed Shortcode
sections.installation:
Event Timeline Feed [Installation Guide]

  1. You can:
    • Upload the entire timeline-feed folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory via FTP.
    • Upload the zip file of plugin via Plugins -> Add New -> Upload in your WordPress Admin Panel.
    • Search Timeline Feed in the search engine available on Plugins -> Add New and press Install Now button.
  2. Activate the plugin through Plugins menu in WordPress Admin Panel.
  3. Click on Timeline Feed menu to configure the plugin.
  4. Ready, now you can use it.
sections.faq:
How to add timeline feed to a page or post?

Use the shortcode [timeline_feed id=ID] (replace ID with the timeline ID) in any page or post to display the timeline feed.

sections.reviews:
so simple it's very versatile

By charlotte (charlotte23) on May 17, 2022

This is very simple to use, so simple it's very versatile. I like that the date field is a text field so I can use it for any words. It looks nice too. My thanks to the developer.

A very useful timeline plugin

By moewang on December 3, 2019

After using this plugin, I feel that the interface is very simple and very friendly to our webmaster. I hope to continue developing. I am also trying to provide simplified Chinese translation for this plugin.
